entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 31 with temperature rising to minus 25 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31 with temperature rising to minus 25 by morning. Wind chill minus 43 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022
